Required in argument array or not. Optional, default: false

member.summary: Annotates a property that can be linked to a named argument.

member.summary: Unknown error occured.

member.summary: Unknown argument in the argument array.

member.summary: A required argument is missing.

member.name: F:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ResultState.MissingArgumentName
member.summary: Only a value is provided.

member.name: F:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ResultState.MissingValue
member.summary: Required value is missing.

member.name: F:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ResultState.InvalidType
member.summary: Wrong value type (e.g. trying to convert a string to an integer).

member.name: T:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ArgumentParser
member.summary: Provides methods to analyze the given configuration object by its annotated properties, fills it with values in an argument array and generates information about the analyzed object.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ArgumentParser.Parse(System.String[],System.Object)
member.summary: Analyzes the target object by its annotations and fills its properties with the values in the given argument array.
member.returns: An instance of the parser to provide more information.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ArgumentParser.IsHelp
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates wether the argument list contains a help request. If that is the case, the configuration object will not be filled and the help text should be provided to the user, using the GetHelpText method of the parser.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ArgumentParser.GetUsage
member.summary: Returns with the generated calling information. For example: ToolName [-OptionalParameter:String] <-Limit:String>

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ArgumentParser.GetAppNameAndVersion
member.summary: Returns the name of the assembly and its current version e.g.: "SnBenchmark 1.0.0.0"

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ArgumentParser.GetHelpText
member.summary: Returns detailed information about how to use the tool. Contains the app name and version, usage information and list of the available command line arguments.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ParsingException
member.summary: Represents an argument parsing error.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ParsingException.ErrorCode
member.summary: Type of the error that occured during parsing arguments. See the ResultState enumeration for possible values.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ParsingException.Result
member.summary: Original parser instance that can provide a formatted message and a generated help text.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ParsingException.FormattedMessage
member.summary: Error message to write to the console.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.CommandLineArguments.ParsingException.#ctor(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ParsingException class with serialized data.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Tools.Extensions
member.summary: Class for extension methods

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Extensions.ForEachAsync``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0},System.Int32,System.Func{``0,System.Threading.Tasks.Task})
member.summary: Enumerates a collection in parallel and calls an async method on each item. Useful for making parallel async calls, e.g. independent web requests when the degree of parallelism needs to be limited.
member.param: Source collection.
Number of partitions that the source collection is divided to.
An async action to call on each item.
member.returns: A task tham completes when the action has completed on all items.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier
member.summary: Provides methods that help retrying an operation. You can provide the maximum number of retry attempts, the callback that should be called and the exception type that should be suppressed.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier.Retry(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Type,System.Action)
member.summary: Calls the callback method safely. If the given type of exception is caught, waits and calls the action again. The maximum number of attempts is determined by the count parameter.
member.param: Maximum number of attempts before throwing the caught exception.
Milliseconds to wait between two attempts.
Type of exception that is suppressed and triggers the next attempt.
Void, parameterless method that the retrier executes.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier.Retry``1(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Type,System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Calls the callback method safely. If the given type of exception is caught, waits and calls the function again. The maximum number of attempts is determined by the count parameter.
member.typeparam: The type of the returned object.
member.param: Maximum number of attempts before throwing the caught exception.
Milliseconds to wait between two attempts.
Type of exception that is suppressed and triggers the next attempt.
Parameterless method with T return type.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier.Retry(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Action,System.Func{System.Int32,System.Exception,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Performs an operation, and based on a condition it retries it a given number of times. The checkCondition method is always called, even if there was no exception during the operation. If it returns true, there will be no retries and the metod will exit.
member.param: Maximum number of attempts before throwing the caught exception.
Milliseconds to wait between two attempts.
Parameterless method that performs the operation that will be retried.

Function that will decide about trying again. This method must have 2 parameters with the following types in this order: int, Exception. The first parameter is the number of the current attempt, the second is the caught exception or null. If the decider method returns with true, the main method returns immediately. Otherwise the next attempt will be performed.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier.Retry``1(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{``0},System.Func{``0,System.Int32,System.Exception,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Performs an operation, and based on a condition it retries it a given number of times. The checkCondition method is always called, even if there was no exception during the operation. If it returns true, there will be no retries and the metod will exit.
member.typeparam: The type of the returned object.
member.param: Maximum number of attempts before throwing the caught exception.
Milliseconds to wait between two attempts.
Parameterless method with T return type.

Function that will decide about trying again. This method must have 3 parameters with the following types in this order: T, int, Exception. The first parameter is the return value of the current attempt, second is the number of the current attempt and the third is the caught exception or null. If this checker method returns with true, the main method returns with the callback's result immediately. Otherwise the next attempt will be performed.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier.RetryAsync``1(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task{``0}},System.Func{``0,System.Int32,System.Exception,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Performs an async operation, and based on a condition it retries it a given number of times. The checkCondition method is always called, even if there was no exception during the operation. If it returns true, there will be no retries and the metod will exit.
member.typeparam: The type of the returned object.
member.param: Maximum number of attempts before throwing the caught exception.
Milliseconds to wait between two attempts.
Parameterless method with T return type.

Function that will decide about trying again. This method must have 3 parameters with the following types in this order: T, int, Exception. The first parameter is the return value of the current attempt, second is the number of the current attempt and the third is the caught exception or null. If this checker method returns with true, the main method returns with the callback's result immediately. Otherwise the next attempt will be performed.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.Retrier.RetryAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Func{System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Func{System.Int32,System.Exception,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Performs an operation asynchronously, and based on a condition it retries it a given number of times. The checkCondition method is always called, even if there was no exception during the operation. If it returns true, there will be no retries and the metod will exit.
member.param: Maximum number of attempts before throwing the caught exception.
Milliseconds to wait between two attempts.
Parameterless method that performs the operation that will be retried.

Function that will decide about trying again. This method must have 2 parameters with the following types in this order: int, Exception. The first parameter is the number of the current attempt and the second is the caught exception or null. If this checker method returns with true, the main method returns immediately. Otherwise the next attempt will be performed.

member.summary: Creates an instance of the specified type.

An array of arguments that match in number, order, and type the parameters of the constructor to invoke.
member.returns: A newly created object of the provided type.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.TypeResolver.GetType(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the type with the specified name. First looks for the type using the built-in Type.GetType method, than (in case it is not found) uses the type cache and an app domain search as a fallback.
member.param: Name of the type to load.
Whether to throw an error when a type is not found.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.TypeResolver.FindTypeInAppDomain(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Loads the type with the specified name from the type cache or from the current app domain.
member.param: Name of the type to load.
Whether to throw an error when a type is not found.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.TypeResolver.GetAssemblies
member.summary: Loads all assemblies in the current app domain.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Tools.TypeResolver.LoadAssembliesFrom(System.String)
member.summary: Loads all assemblies from the specified file system path.
member.param: A file system path where assemblies should be loaded from.
member.returns: An array of file names of loaded assemblies in the specified folder.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Diagnostics.IEventTypeProvider
member.summary: Defines an interface for exception types that need to redefine the default severity (Error) when they are logged. Custom exception classes can implement this interface and override the EventType property to return a different log level - e.g. Warning instead of Error.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.IEventTypeProvider.EventType
member.summary: Event level when logging a custom exception. Default: TraceEventType.Error

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnLog.WriteAudit(SenseNet.Diagnostics.IAuditEvent,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.Object})
member.summary: Writes an audit message to the log. Event level will be Verbose; it is the responsibility of the logger to channel this event to the appropriate log storage based on the provided category.
member.param: An object that represents an audit event.
Event properties.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace
member.summary: Efficient and scalable tracing component. Provides methods for recording verbose information about the running system. Collects messages into a buffer and writes them to the file system periodically. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation
member.summary: Represents an execution block that needs a start and finish log message regardless of whether the execution was successful or not. The two messages can be associated by their common operation id. Setting the Successful property to true is mandatory when the execution was successful - otherwise the logger would assume that the operation failed. Tipical usage: using (var op = SnTrace.StartOperation("message")) { ...; op.Successful = true; }

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.Id
member.summary: Gets the operation identifier that is unique in the current AppDomain.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.Category
member.summary: Gets the category name.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.StartedAt
member.summary: Gets the time when the operation started.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.Message
member.summary: Gets the operation message that is written at start and at the end.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.Successful
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the operation is finished correctly. Always set this flag to true when the code block executed correctly. Default is false.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.Dispose
member.summary: Finishes the operation and writes the trace line containing the message and the running time.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Operation.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the Operation object and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: True to release both managed and unmanaged resources or false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: T:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.SnTraceCategory
member.summary: Represents an SnTrace category. It helps differentiating trace lines that are generated by different features.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.SnTraceCategory.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of the category.

member.name: P:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.SnTraceCategory.Enabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the category is enabled or not. Messages sent to a disabled category will not be writted to the trace log.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.SnTraceCategory.StartOperation(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Starts a traced operation in the current category. The message will be written to the trace with smart formatting.
member.param: Message template that works as a composite format string (see string.Format method).

Parameters that will be substituted into the message template. Null values will be written as "null". IEnumerable values will be written as comma separated lists. All control characters (including tabs, return and line feed) are changed to '.'
member.returns: A disposable operation object usually encapsulated in a using block.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.SnTraceCategory.Write(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes a line to the trace with the current category. The message will be written with smart formatting.
member.param: Message template that works as a composite format string (see string.Format method).

Parameters that will be substituted into the message template. Null values will be written as "null". IEnumerable values will be written as comma separated lists. All control characters (including tabs, return and line feed) are changed to '.'

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.SnTraceCategory.WriteError(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an error line to the trace with the current category. The message will be written with smart formatting.
member.param: Message template that works as a composite format string (see string.Format method).

Parameters that will be substituted into the message template. Null values will be written as "null". IEnumerable values will be written as comma separated lists. All control characters (including tabs, return and line feed) are changed to '.'

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Category(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a dynamic trace category.
member.param: Category name.
member.returns: A category object that is enabled (meaning messages written into it will be persisted) if the Custom category is enabled.

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.StartOperation(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Starts a traced operation in the "Custom" category. The message will be written to the trace with smart formatting.
member.param: Message template that works as a composite format string (see string.Format method).

Parameters that will be substituted into the message template. Null values will be written as "null". IEnumerable values will be written as comma separated lists. All control characters (including tabs, return and line feed) are changed to '.'

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.Write(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes a line to the trace in the "Custom" category. The message will be written with smart formatting.
member.param: Message template that works as a composite format string (see string.Format method).

Parameters that will be substituted into the message template. Null values will be written as "null". IEnumerable values will be written as comma separated lists. All control characters (including tabs, return and line feed) are changed to '.'

member.name: M:SenseNet.Diagnostics.SnTrace.WriteError(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an error line to the trace in the "Custom" category. The message will be written with smart formatting.
member.param: Message template that works as a composite format string (see string.Format method).

Parameters that will be substituted into the message template. Null values will be written as "null". IEnumerable values will be written as comma separated lists. All control characters (including tabs, return and line feed) are changed to '.'

member.name: T:SenseNet.Diagnostics.EventId
member.summary: Contains all event ids in Sense/Net ECM including satellite applications and external components. In your custom code please consider defining custom event ids and use these built-in values only if the event is truly related to the feature it is defined for.

member.name: F:SenseNet.Diagnostics.EventId.NotDefined
member.summary: General, not classified event. Value: 1.

member.name: F:SenseNet.Diagnostics.EventId.NotSupported
member.summary: Event if the feature is not supported in the current context. Value: 10.

member.name: F:SenseNet.Diagnostics.EventId.Serialization
member.summary: Serialization / deserialization related event. Value: 11

member.name: F:SenseNet.Diagnostics.EventId.RepositoryRuntime

member.summary: Security related event. Value: 40

member.name: F:SenseNet.Diagnostics.EventId.Indexing
